data.question: What is the general composition formula for the porphyrin-based metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) synthesized in the study?
Which metals were used in the synthesis of the trigonal SBUs for the MOFs?
data.answer: Mg, Mn, Co, Ni, and Fe

data.question: What method was used to confirm the oxidation state of SBU metals in the MOFs?
What was the highest observed conversion rate (k_obs) for the photo-oxidation of 1,5-dihydroxynaphthalene among the synthesized MOFs?
Which MOF showed a further 26% increase in catalytic performance compared to its best single component MOF counterpart?
True or False: The coordination environment of metals in the MOFs was altered after solvent removal and catalytic processes.
What was the role of UV-vis diffuse reflectance spectra (DRS) in the study?
data.answer: To calculate the band gaps of the MOFs

data.question: True or False: The MOFs synthesized in the study are all isoreticular with hexagonal topology.
What was the main finding regarding the spatial arrangement of metals in the multivariate MOFs (MTV-MOFs)?
data.answer: MTV-MOFs with well-mixed metals in their SBUs performed better than those with domain arrangements.

data.question: True or False: The activation procedures for the MOFs involved heating the mixture at 150°C in glass vials for 12 to 36 hours.
Which technique was used to measure the position of the valence band of the MOFs?
What was the significance of using electron paramagnetic resonance (EPR) in the study?
data.answer: To confirm the oxidation state of Mn and Co in the MOFs

data.question: True or False: The study found that the catalytic performances of all MOFs were significantly higher than the discrete unlinked porphyrin linker.
What was the main purpose of synthesizing porphyrin-based MOFs with different metal compositions?
data.answer: To explore the influence of metals on the properties and catalytic performance of the MOFs

data.question: True or False: The study utilized synchrotron X-ray absorption analysis to reveal that the coordination environment of metals was maintained.
What was the role of the BET surface area measurements in the study?
data.answer: To determine the porosity and surface area of selected MOFs

data.question: True or False: The study demonstrated that the well-mixed spatial arrangement within the SBUs leads to better performance than the sum of the parts.
What was the main finding from the Mössbauer spectroscopy analysis of the MOFs?
data.answer: All Fe in the studied MOFs were in the +3 oxidation state

data.question: True or False: The study found that the light-harvesting ability of the MOFs directly correlated with their catalytic performance.
What was the main conclusion regarding the impact of metal spatial arrangement on the reactivity of MTV-MOFs?
data.answer: MTV-MOFs with well-mixed metals in their SBUs showed enhanced reactivity compared to those with domain arrangements.
